'Smith Reynolds Airport' is a public airport located 3 miles (5Â km)
northeast of the city of Winston-Salem in Forsyth County, North Carolina, USA.
The airport has two runways, and is used primarily for general aviation and
flight training, although some passenger operations take place there. In
addition, it is home to the Winston-Salem air show, which is usually held in
September, and draws about 20,000 spectators.
